name: The Forgotten Books
description:
Since the creation of our world, people has written lots of books. Some of them, are very famous, like the holy bible, Don Quijote, Lord of the rings or Harry Potter. 

Some others, are unknown, and have been forgotten by society. This list of books, are 4 books that disappeared long time ago. 

From shakespeare to Homer. You have to find this 4 books in a secret library that you have found. But be aware, there have been reports of strange creatures inhabiting this library.

Good Luck, you will need it.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement
Spacebar - Light on/off
Shift - Crouch
E - Interaction
R - Recharge

L - Skip level (cheats)
K - Go to last checkpoint (cheats)
